title: Affordable 1 Bed Apartment in Lowertown St Paul
posting_body: ['A perfect blend of historical charm in a welcoming urban community.', 'What once held the clatter of knitting machines has now become an artfully designed renovation.', 'Straus Lofts, in the heart of Lowertown St. Paul and across from Mears Park, presents loft-style apartment living in studios, one, two, and three bedroom floor plans.', 'Outstanding building features include a fitness center, community room, bar and restaurant.', 'In your apartment you will enjoy unique floor plans, large windows, high ceilings, spacious closets and in-unit thermostat controls.', "Living downtown certainly has its benefits - you can live within a couple of blocks of the Downtown St. Paul Farmer's Market, the light rail, the river, CHS Field, downtown venues and entertainment, and a multitude of bars and restaurants.", '1 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom | $1,350/month | 750-948 SF', 'For more information please call or to set up a showing call:', 'show contact info', 'Community Amenities:', 'Ramp garage space available', '24 hour fitness center', 'Party room open all day and available for a private party or events', 'Laundry facilities conveniently located on each floor', 'Water, sewer, trash removal and District Heat are included in rent', 'Secured entry to building', 'Smoke-Free', 'Cats and Dogs welcome, dogs under 30 pounds', 'Apartment Amenities:', 'In-unit thermostat controls', 'Spacious closets', 'High ceilings', 'Large windows', 'Unique floor plans', 'Pay your rent online!', '*Rents subject to change daily, please contact us for the most updated pricing', 'Rental income limits apply to some units; please contact for more information.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
